content:
Hello everyone,

I have a major problem: I use Claude Pro to work through fairly complex topics, and I keep running into the issue that the chat becomes too long. This is a real obstacle for me.

Additionally, I have the impression that Claude does not reliably remember the project‚Äôs constraints once you open a new chat within the same project.

I would be very grateful for help‚Äîespecially on how to improve Claude‚Äôs ‚Äúmemory,‚Äù so that I can continue working on these complex workflows in a meaningful way with the AI, or so that working on them becomes truly feasible in the first place.

Best regards from Berlin,
Flo

content:
I swear these limits, are hurting my self esteem.. Feels like after the holiday 2x bonus, limits were adjusted too far back in time to the first time when they were unreasonable. Max 5x user here, and when I never used to hit a weekly limit or even a session limit, I find myself hitting the limit every 5 hours, every time I start a new session I go up like 3%, ask it a few prompts, and poof I'm at 60% of my session limit in 30 minutes out of my 5 hour total.

Don't even get me started on my weekly limit..

As a user paying $100/month, these limits are absurd, they just feel off. - Completely borked.

Today was the first day since like December 21st, that I've been able to sit here and write code with claude for more than 30 minutes at a time, only because usage was temporarily broken so I full speed Opus and put balls to the walls
